param.name: in_features
param.dialogReference: The polygon feature layer containing the features you wish to obtain homlessness risk rankings for. These can be neighborhoods, census blocks, or any other polygon of your chosing.

param.name: risk_factors
param.dialogReference: The field names of risk factors in your input features layer where high values indicate greater risk. These risk factors may have been obtained from the enrich layer tool or through your own analysis,

param.name: reverse_fields
param.dialogReference: The field names of risk factors in your input features layer where low values indicate greater risk. These risk factors may have been obtained from the enrich layer tool or through your own analysis,

param.name: out_features
param.dialogReference: A new feature class containing the attributes from the input features and two new fields containing the ranked risk of each variable and the mapped object ids. Only features that do not contain null values will be written to the output.
